title: Ep 163: Actives, Antioxidants, and the Truth About Topicals
itunes:title: Ep 163: Actives, Antioxidants, and the Truth About Topicals
itunes:subtitle: Dermatologist Dr. Macrene Alexiades dives deep on antioxidants, barrier protection, and active ingredients—topics that are talked about a lot in beauty but rarely explained. (Warning: You may expect more from your skincare after this episode!) Before t...
description:
Dermatologist Dr. Macrene Alexiades dives deep on antioxidants, barrier protection, and active ingredients—topics that are talked about a lot in beauty but rarely explained. (Warning: You may expect more from your skincare after this episode!) Before that, we discuss the best anti-chafing products for the summer and why we never want to be photographed next to Emily Ratajkowski.


Want more Fat Mascara?

Our secret Facebook group: Fat Mascara / Raising a Wand
